name: Endless Warcade: Mystery Mines
description:
Mystery Mines is a rougelike/puzzle game where you journey into the mines of NLACakaNM. !Mine for slime, avoid wild slimeoids, and see if you can mine up to the fabled one million megaslime. Fullscreen for best play experience.

Never heard of NLACakaNM? Come visit https://discord.gg/mtSRXek
